title: Thresholding an Image with RangeSlider
description: This lab will demonstrate how to use the RangeSlider widget in Matplotlib to control the thresholding of an image. The purpose of thresholding is to convert a grayscale image into a binary image, where the pixels are either black or white. This is useful for image segmentation, where we want to extract certain features from the image.

meta.title: Matplotlib RangeSlider | Image Thresholding Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to use the RangeSlider widget in Matplotlib to control image thresholding for segmentation and feature extraction.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, RangeSlider, Image Thresholding, Image Segmentation, Python

Der Zweck der Schwellwertbildung ist es, ein Graustufenbild in ein binäres Bild umzuwandeln, bei dem die Pixel entweder schwarz oder weiß sind.
